short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces Chrome's New Tab page with a minimalist page that shows a new joyful quote every day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a Chrome extension that displays calming and joyful quotes on your New Tab page.

These are personal reflections I’ve gathered over the years on my own journey through life. They’ve resonated with me, but that doesn't mean they have to work for everyone.
That’s why I’ve expressed them in the first person, as I think there is almost no general advice that applies to everyone.
